title: Follow-Up VA – Real Estate (Land Wholesaling) | Closify Offers Inc.
job_overview:
Are you great at staying organized, consistent with follow-through, and able to build rapport through calls and texts?

Closify Offers Inc. is a U.S.-based real estate investment company looking for a proactive and detail-oriented Follow-Up Virtual Assistant to help us stay in touch with landowners who have shown interest in selling but haven’t closed yet.

This is a critical role in our acquisition pipeline — you’ll help us turn “maybe” leads into signed deals.

???? What You’ll Be Doing:
Follow up consistently with warm leads via phone, SMS, and email

Use our scripts and templates to re-engage sellers

Tag, update, and organize lead statuses in our internal CRM

Set appointments for acquisition managers with re-engaged leads

Keep daily notes and communicate with the team about progress

Stay on top of follow-up schedules without needing reminders

???? Compensation:
$5/hour, paid weekly (Wise or PayPal)

$5 bonus for each re-engaged lead that becomes an appointment

$10 bonus for each lead that signs contract

1% commission on deals closed from your follow-up efforts

? What We’re Looking For:
Excellent English (spoken and written) with a neutral or great accent

At least 6 months of VA, cold calling, follow-up, or sales experience

Organized and consistent — must be able to follow through daily

Comfortable texting AND calling leads

Self-motivated, dependable, and good with time management

Familiarity with real estate or wholesaling is a plus, but not required

Full-time availability during U.S. hours (EST preferred)

???? How to Apply (Read Carefully):
Only applicants who follow these 2 steps will be considered:

Start your message with the keyword: “Closer Fuel”

Submit a voice or video recording (via Vocaroo, Loom, or any link)

Introduce yourself

Share why you think you're a great fit for a follow-up role

?? No resume, no cover letter. Just the keyword + recording.
If we like what we hear, you’ll receive a link to our official application form.

We’re scaling fast and looking for people who are hungry, coachable, and committed to long-term growth. If that’s you — apply today and let’s lock in some deals!
